```{r, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(flexdashboard)
library(DT)
library(crosstalk)
source("utils.R")

shared_leaderboard <- select_leaderboard("Gym Fishing")
```   

Column{.sidebar data-width=300}
---------

#### Filters

```{r envfilters}
filter_select(
  id = "Environments",
  label = "Env",
  sharedData = shared_leaderboard,
  group = ~env,
  multiple = FALSE
)

filter_select(
  id = "Agents",
  label = "Agent",
  sharedData = shared_leaderboard,
  group = ~agent,
  multiple = FALSE
)

filter_select(
  id = "Teams",
  label = "Team",
  sharedData = shared_leaderboard,
  group = ~team,
  multiple = FALSE
)


```
